title: Die Leiden des jungen Werther (von Johann Wolfgang von Goethe)
author: Unknown
content:
This complete text of “Die Leiden des jungen Werther” by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe,
as well as the paintings by Caspar David Friedrich, are in the public domain.



Amazon: “Die Leiden des jungen Werther”.


This page has been created by Philipp Lenssen.

Page last updated on April 2003.
